content: "My metabolism is such that no matter how much I eat I don't put on weight." "Just now, this second, you've made enemies of people throughout the world."
translations: ita:Il mio metabolismo Ã¨ tale che non importa quanto mangio non ingrasso. Proprio adesso, in questo secondo, ti sei fatto ne
